title: test_AnnexRepo_commit failures on Travis
body:
`test_AnnexRepo_commit` failed in two recent PRs (gh-4762 and gh-4768).  I think it's intermittent.

- https://travis-ci.org/github/datalad/datalad/jobs/712219198#L1996
- https://travis-ci.org/github/datalad/datalad/jobs/712340298#L1991

```
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.support.tests.test_annexrepo.test_AnnexRepo_commit
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 1185, in newfunc
    raise exc_info[1]
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 1157, in newfunc
    ret = func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 728, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/support/tests/test_annexrepo.py", line 786, in test_AnnexRepo_commit
    assert_raises(FileNotInRepositoryError, ds.commit, files="not-existing")
  File "/opt/python/3.7.1/lib/python3.7/unittest/case.py", line 743, in assertRaises
    return context.handle('assertRaises', args, kwargs)
  File "/opt/python/3.7.1/lib/python3.7/unittest/case.py", line 178, in handle
    callable_obj(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 1654, in commit
    stdin=None,
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/cmd.py", line 504, in run
    **results,
datalad.support.exceptions.CommandError: CommandError: 'git commit -m '[DATALAD] Recorded changes' -- not-existing' failed with exitcode 1 under /tmp/datalad_temp_test_AnnexRepo_commitmkv02v44
```
